ca.utoronto.utm.paint

类 Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Shape
        • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    Subclass of Shape, which creates a rectangle object with two opposite corners at first click and the last.
    作者:
    Mengning Yang

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Rectangle(Point start, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, javafx.scene.shape.StrokeType stroke)
      Constructor of the outline of a rectangle

      Another constructor with more detailed attribute of a rectangle.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void calcPoints(Point p)
      This method updates the point of a rectangle, which allows the user to draw the rectangle from different directions.
      void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)
      an override method from Shape, which draws the rectangle according to different conditions, outlined, filled, etc.

      double getWidth()

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(Point start,
                 javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
                 javafx.scene.shape.StrokeType stroke)
        Constructor of the outline of a rectangle
        参数:
        start - initial point of the rectangle
        color - color of the rectangle
        stroke - strokeType of the rectangle

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(Point start,
                 javafx.scene.paint.Color colour,
                 javafx.scene.shape.StrokeType stroke,
                 java.lang.Boolean filled,
                 boolean outlined,
                 int thickness,
                 javafx.scene.paint.Color outlineColor)
        Another constructor with more detailed attribute of a rectangle.
        参数:
        start - initial point of the rectangle
        colour - color of the fill of rectangle
        stroke - strokeType of the rectangle
        filled - whether the rectangle is filled
        outlined - whether the rectangle has outline
        thickness - thickness of the outline of the rectangle
        outlineColor - outline color of the rectangle
